mapper.select: select n.sku_id from tb_num_price_agent n group by n.sku_id

select sku.sku_id from tb_goods c join tb_sku sku on c.g_id=sku.g_id where SYSDATE( ) BETWEEN c.g_start_time AND c.g_end_time and c.`status` = 1 AND c.g_is_auc = 0 AND sku.sku_goods_type = '4' AND c.g_is_sale = '1'
mapper.update: update tb_num_price_agent g set g.activity_id=#{activityId} , g.activity_type=#{activityType}, g.activity_sdate=#{activitySdate}, g.activity_edate=#{activityEdate}, g.activity_price=#{activityPrice} where g.agent_id=#{agentId} and g.corp_id=#{corpId} and g.resource =#{resource}
